products.title: Orient Faux Silk White Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Orient Faux Silk White Roman Blind in White. Made to measure from £14.99 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Orient Faux-Silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. 
 This White faux-silk roman blind, introduces a bright white to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting, dark accessories. 
 Add a touch of luxury to your home with our hand-made roman blinds. At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a FREE five year warranty, for extra peace of mind. 
 
 Product ID: DB-IROM0033 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Faux Suede White Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux Suede White Roman Blind in White. Made to measure from £15.58 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Create a spacious and chic interior with our white faux suede Roman Blind. 
 
Our Faux Suede Deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of our most popular fabrics for roman blinds and curtains. Still, at the forefront of fashion, this fabric makes sumptuous Roman blinds and curtains to enhance your home interior. 
 
This blind is great at creating contrast but is also fantastic on its own creating that minimalist look highly sought after in today’s living. 
 
All our blinds are quality checked throughout the manufacturing process, our skilled team will ensure you receive the perfect blind for your home or interior project. Swift Blinds Direct are proud of their reputation which they have developed over the last 50 years. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM0017 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Velvet Canvas Cream Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Velvet Canvas Cream Roman Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £17.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home.  A multi-tonal fabric, our smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day.  From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. 
 
This soft roman blind in Canvas Cream, introduces a warm-toned cream hue to your home.  A light cream shade creates a sense of warmth and calm, and this velvet cream roman blind creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this roman blind made by the experts at our Yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, our roman blinds are made to last.  Our roman blinds come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service!  
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM1158 Fabric Colour: Canvas Cream Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Panama White Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Panama White Roman Blind in White. Made to measure from £16.80 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Panama range is available in a full rainbow of colours so we are sure you will find the shade to compliment your décor and interior design style. 
 
This classic white roman blind is made from 100% cotton and is the perfect addition to freshen up any room in your home. 
 
The classic white material is great to coordinate with a diverse range of colours and is therefore a great candidate for a mix and match interior. 
 
Here at Swift Direct Blinds quality is important to us, and our customers vote us excellent on the independent review site ‘Trustpilot’. You can be assured that we will manufacture your blind to a standard we would have in our own homes.
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM0119 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Cotton Panama Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Galaxy Glacier White Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Galaxy Glacier White Roman Blind in White. Made to measure from £20.63 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Invigorate your living space with the rustic texture and cool white colourway of the Galaxy Glacier Roman Blind. The white woven fabric is uplifted from simple to special with the addition of sparkly metallic yarns within the weave. This practical window blind is perfect for creating a sense of serenity in your scheme and will make a light and bright impact in any area.

products.title: Banbury Canvas Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Banbury Canvas Roman Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £23.65 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
With a chic and subtle style, the Banbury Canvas Roman Blind will suit a range of settings, whether classic or contemporary. This fabric blind has a sleek folding design that is compact and convenient at any window. The geometric pattern is highlighted in a soft cream tone and gives a touch of clean decoration in a versatile and neutral colour.

products.title: Ascot Stripe White Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Ascot Stripe White Roman Blind in White. Made to measure from £23.65 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The ultimate in graceful grandeur, the Ascot Striped roman blind in white will sit timelessly in any window. The cloth has an unusually silky quality, while being woven of fibres which trap air for maximum insulation. So, whether you choose to hang these blinds upstairs or down, you can be assured you’re investing in a piece enriched with timeless style.

products.metadescription: Windsor Canvas Roman Blind in White. Made to measure from £26.40 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Made from silky-feel, neutral toned fabric and beautifully enriched with strands of metallic yarn, this window blind will make a simple yet sophisticated update for your decor. The Windsor Canvas Roman Blind features a lustrous and sparkling finish that is given further richness by the visual effect of the smooth curving pattern.

products.productdescription:
Min Width: 350mm Max Width: 2500mm
